name: recipes_by_author
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool worldwide_recipes.
Tool description: Over 2 MILLION recipes, nutrition, ingredients, users and reviews worldwide.
API description: Fetches recipes by a given author profile from the Worldwide Recipes API.

profile_name.description: The name of the author's profile to fetch recipes for.

q.description: An optional query string to filter recipes.

start.description:
For pagination, eg: 

- Page 1 = start:0
- Page 2 = start:20
- Page 3 = start:40

and so on...
